review:
Me and my wife visited doctor Stuti post more than hour search on web for for best gynaecologist in Dwarka. After detailed comparison, Dr. Stuti‚Äôs name appeared on top. 
Believe me every bit written for her on reviews is 100% correct and legitimate. She have always consulted my wife as her own child , be it physical consultation or on calls or WhatsApp. 
We visited her for child planning and irregular menstrual issues with wife which was suspected as pcod/pcos. Later wife has mentioned that she feels bloated all day and consumes very less food and also that she is suffering from nausea, loss of appetite, headache etc. On this Dr. Stuti immediately recommended the best Ultrasound doctor in Dwarka, Dr. Vershey. Also she did recommend top bariatric surgeon if abdominal mass is confirmed post ultrasound. Wife actually had more than 4.5 inch of mass in her left side of stomach. She got treated by top doctor, thanks to Dr. Stuti , she came as an angel in our life and saved my wife just in time and recommended right doctors for the process ahead. She also did helped us for smooth transition at top hospital in Dwarka and is continuously following up till date. 
God bless wealth of good health to the Angel, the mother, the beautiful soul. Thank you Doctor for everything. Shall visit soon for child planning soon. God Bless. 
Highly Highly RECOMMENDED Guys‚Ä¶..You will not return unsatisfied.
reply_text: Thanks dear for ur kind words may God bless pooja a very healthy long life .

review:
I consulted Dr. Stuti in 2014 after I was advised to have hysterectomy by other doctors. She patiently heard me and saw all my reports and past history and lab results.
After a thorough examination she explained me that how it can be cured by medicines and prescribed medicines for three cycles along with some other for instant relief.
She not only saved me from going under the knife but also from the mental trauma that I would have had to go through otherwise.
I strongly recommend Dr. Stuti for patients who are looking for honest opinion.

review:
I contacted Dr. Stuti Ranjan for my mother's Vaginal hysterectomy. She explained to us very clearly about it and on our request liaised with hospital for date of surgery and other related pre surgery formalities.

Overall, very much satisfied with her and last but not the least she is a wonderful human being too!
